|stockos = Linux;;; |exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = yes,, 10-pin header,, |specialfeat = |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, 1024QAM, DFS (master), |addchip = 2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;3; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;6; ,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 03/28/2017 |estreldate = 01/03/2017 |estprice = 270 |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = N82E16833124595 |asin = B071DKY952 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4365E;BCM4365EKMMLG, UE1643 P30, 638336-29 3; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1625 |nqam1 = 750 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4365E;BCM4365EKMMLG, UE1643 P30, 638336-29 3; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1625 |nqam2 = 750 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = |rad3chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4365E;BCM4365EKMMLG, UE1643 P30, 638336-29 3; |rad3oui = |rad3_ant_conn = U.FL |rad3txchains = 3 |rad3rxchains = 3 |rad3sstreams = 3 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam3 = 750 |rad3n = 450 |rad3g = 54 |rad3b = 11 |rad3freq = 2.4 |rad3correv = |rad3cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== EA9250 may be an alternate or internal name for this product. *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q87-EA9300 Q87-EA9300] (2017-03-28) - [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2773801 FCC label] - PSU 12V/5A *[https://fccid.io/Q87-EA9300/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-3334517 FCC Internal Photos] - OEM: [[Wistron NeWeb]] :"48SAB902.BGA" is silkscreened on the main board. :"48SAB904.0GA" is silkscreened on the LED board. *[[Dynamic Frequency Selection (DFS)|DFS]] was added to the FCC entry with a Class II Product Change :request on 11/30/2017. ===Specifications=== [http://www.anandtech.com/show/10954/linksys-enters-mesh-wifi-market-with-velop-whole-home-wifi-expands-maxstream-lineup ''Linksys EA9300'' on '''AnandTech'''] *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/wireless/wireless-lan-infrastructure/bcm49408 ''BCM4908''] @1.8 GHz Quad-Core (ARM Cortex-A53) *WLAN: 2x 3T3R AC [https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/xdsl/bcm4366e BCM4365E] + 1x 3T3R N [https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/xdsl/bcm4366e BCM4365E] :WiSoC (ARM Cortex-A7), 3x3 MU-MIMO, 40/80MHz, QAM-1024 :DualBand, acqam, 5GHz (2x 1625Mbps), 2.4GHz (750Mbps) ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33115-linksys-ea9300-max-stream-ac4000-tri-band-wi-fi-router-reviewed ''Linksys EA9300 Max-Stream AC4000 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router Reviewed''
on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/new-ac4000-max-stream-router-and-ac1900-cable-gateway-from-linksys.39063/ ''Linksys EA9300'' on '''SNB''' forums] ==See also== [[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[Linksys EA9500]] - AC5400 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA9500 PPage] *Linksys EA9300 - AC4000 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA9300 PPage] *[[Linksys EA9200]] - AC3200 Tri-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA9200 PPage] *[[Linksys EA8500]] - AC2600 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA8500 PPage] *[[Linksys EA8300]] - AC2200 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA8300 PPage] *[[Linksys EA7500]] - AC1900 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA7500 PPage] *[[Linksys EA7300]] - AC1750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA7300 PPage] [[Category:English Documentation]]
